question: This country's cabinet approved the national policy of the atomic energy program recently.
explanation: Saudi Arabia's cabinet approved the national policy of the atomic energy program. The national policy limits all nuclear activities to peaceful purposes, within the limits drawn by international treaties. It also highlights the need for optimal utilization of natural resources from nuclear materials and usage of best practices for radioactive waste management. Riyadh had invited US companies to participate in developing Saudi Arabia's first atomic energy programme.
